body:
>一旦加 legend 等组件也加入了事件，这些事件处理的代码可能都会出问题。

可以为legend 添加特定的事件，比如：legendmouseover 、legendmouseout，独立于原来的mouseover 等事件。
或者支持使用类似jQuery 的语法：
```
chart.on('mouseover', 'legend', function(){});
```

现在我们对于legend 的hover 事件还是有需求的，希望能支持~

thanks for the quick revert :)
and i must say an awesome library you've created ! kudos !
can u add animation capability like treemap ? because sometimes i want the same block item to move from coord say [x,y] to [a,b]

or can i have the treemap flow from left to right with items having equal square blocks and only color to be used for visual mapping ( see attached image.. ive used blocks of divs to generate this heatmap ) .. and when i tried using a echarts visual dimension with a constant value.. yet the squares are not exactly equal... and do not flow exactly from left to right consistently

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4696146/24904105/076c86cc-1ecd-11e7-8b5f-5fceb57fbda3.png)

在 xAxis 上设置：
```js
xAxis: {
    min: 'dataMin',
    max: 'dataMax'
}
```
就和原来一样了。

参见：<https://jsfiddle.net/4c9uLndh/5/>
以及 [xAxis.min](http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#xAxis.min)

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4696146/24941139/ca15571a-1f65-11e7-898e-6ca3988be51f.png)
@100pah 感谢

The squareRatio is a suggestive parameter. If you would like getting the same square size, not only the squareRatio is set to `1`, but also the `width` and `height` should be set the same: ```js series: [{ type: 'treemap', width: 300, height: 300, squareRatio: 1 }] ``` (See this [sample](http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xH1rmiVoal&v=2)) And, the sorting algorithm of `treemap` does not consider the stability for nodes with the same value yet. But even if it has been considered, the result will be like that: The number displayed on each block is its `dataIndex`. That is, the layout order is: firstly horizontal, then vertical, then horizontal, then vertical, ... This result is inevitable by `treemap` layout algorithm, and it may be not your expectation. So I think `heatmap` may be better solution for your case? I will think this through about animation of `heatmap`.
@HealerJTF 这种情况为什么要用interval呢？如果非要用可以将interval的值设置的大一些。
我试了一下就放弃了那种方式，然后又回到了起点的问题，Y轴的数值不是整数。你的是怎么解决的呢？

For heatmap, I have made an [example](http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xHk0xr8jpg&v=3). I hope it is able to fit your requirement.

Thanks, radar chart doesn't have separate axis. Use radar chart only need [radar](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/option.html#radar) component and [radar](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/option.html#series-radar) series

加上min等于0，minInterval就不管用了

+ 若 `xAxis` 为 `'category'`，则须造空数据补足。
+ 可使用 `'time'` 类型的 `xAxis`，可以自动处理空数据。
